resources.string:
Hi,My name is Avula Sreelatha. 
I am an Android developer at 3Embed Software Technologies Pvt Ltd. 
I did a Masters degree in Computer Applications (MCA). 
I completed a comprehensive course on Java with a focus on full-stack web development and also data structures and algorithm. 
I have good knowledge in kotlin,I created some projects in Android studio using kotlin language, I learn about layouts as well as firebase,services,Mvvm architecture,view model,live data. 
 I am eager to learn new technologies which provides a lot of challenges.I like to take challenges and it takes best out of me every time and make me strong and it always brings best out of me as well. 
 currently working on project which is sold
